author: SIC Notícias
title: Ground News - Israeli offensive has already killed 1% of Gaza and Sergey Lavrov alleges the exclusion of Moscow in peace agreements
text:
Summary by SIC Notícias Israel concentrated the offensive in the center and south of the Gaza Strip, with several refugee camps as its main targets, where several fighters from Hamas and Islamic Jihad claim to be located. The Russian Foreign Minister points out the West's strategic failure to defeat Russia and accuses the main Western powers of excluding Moscow from a potential peace agreement in Ukraine. author: 小浪财讯
title: 骏亚科技跌1.63%，成交额1.78亿元，近5日主力净流入-2132.53万|PCB_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
8月14日， 骏亚科技 跌1.63%，成交额1.78亿元，换手率3.74%，总市值47.19亿元。
异动分析
PCB概念+毫米波雷达+汽车电子+小米概念+华为概念
1、广东骏亚电子科技股份有限公司的主营业务是印制电路板的研发、生产和销售,及印制电路板的表面贴装。公司的主要产品是刚性电路板、柔性电路板（FPC）、刚柔结合板（RFPC）、高密度互联电路板（HDI）、PCBA。
2、2023年2月23日公司互动：公司有供应车载毫米波雷达相关PCB产品，但目前以样板及小批量为主。
3、公司有超过10年的车载PCB制造经验，与 比亚迪 、华阳通用合作多年。近年，车载PCB是公司业务发展的重点，公司积极布局车载PCB发展战略，将龙南骏亚电子科技有限公司打造成专业的车载PCB研发制造工厂，对汽车电子应用相关产线、设备、生产体系与管理进行调整，同时引入更多车载PCB业务力量，加大市场开拓力度，逐步提升公司车载PCB的订单份额。
4、公司在互动易平台表示，公司是小米的合格供应商，双方合作良好。公司暂未涉及芯片方面业务。公司目前主要产品为印制电路板及 SMT 贴装。
5、公司已通过华为主要供应商认证并大批量供货于华为产品。
(免责声明：分析内容来源于互联网，不构成投资建议，请投资者根据不同行情独立判断)
资金分析
今日主力净流入-260.19万，占比0.01%，行业排名18/61，连续2日被主力资金减仓；所属行业主力净流入-38.43亿，当前无连续增减仓现象，主力趋势不明显。
区间 今日 近3日 近5日 近10日 近20日 主力净流入 -260.19万 -1613.88万 -2132.53万 -5291.74万 -1.44亿
主力持仓
主力没有控盘，筹码分布非常分散，主力成交额3024.27万，占总成交额的3.9%。
技术面：筹码平均交易成本为13.60元
该股筹码平均交易成本为13.60元，近期该股获筹码青睐，且集中度渐增；目前股价靠近压力位14.84，谨防压力位处回调，若突破压力位则可能会开启一波上涨行情。
公司简介
资料显示，广东骏亚电子科技股份有限公司位于广东省惠州市惠城区(三栋)数码工业园25号区，成立日期2005年11月22日，上市日期2017年9月12日，公司主营业务涉及印制电路板(PCB)的研发、生产和销售及印制电路板的表面贴装(SMT),细分领域涵盖印制电路板的研发样板、小批量板、中大批量板。主营业务收入构成为：PCB88.64%，其他(补充)6.46%，SMT2.50%，整机2.40%。
骏亚科技所属申万行业为：电子-元件-印制电路板。所属概念板块包括：PCB概念、汽车电子、半导体、毫米波雷达、华为概念等。
截至3月31日，骏亚科技股东户数1.81万，较上期增加2.22%；人均流通股18057股，较上期减少2.17%。2025年1月-3月，骏亚科技实现营业收入5.92亿元，同比增长22.11%；归母净利润1509.87万元，同比增长194.55%。
分红方面，骏亚科技A股上市后累计派现3.06亿元。近三年，累计派现9332.83万元。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: BVM Sportsdesk
title: Cougars' Heartbreaking 70-68 Loss to Pacific in Nail-Biter
text:
Cougars’ Heartbreaking 70-68 Loss to Pacific in Nail-Biter
Washington State men's basketball suffered a close loss to Pacific, falling 70-68 in a heated match at the Alex G. Spanos Center. The game saw numerous lead changes and ties, with Pacific clinching the lead in the final seconds. With this defeat, the Cougars' record drops to 15-8 and 5-5 in WCC play. Despite a strong performance from Dane Erikstrup, who led the team with 17 points, WSU struggled with rebounding, which ultimately impacted the outcome.
- Dane Erikstrup scored 17 points, achieving a season-high in assists (4) and steals (4).
- Washington State shot 47% from three-point range but was outrebounded by Pacific 34-24.
Although Washington State excelled in three-point shooting, their significant rebounding deficit and inability to secure offensive boards hindered their chances for victory. The Cougars have struggled on the road, falling to 3-4 in away games this season.
State of Play- The loss marked Washington State's second consecutive defeat.
- Pacific's tightly contested win improved their all-time record against WSU to 2-0.
WSU heads to San Francisco for their next match-up on Saturday at 7 p.m. This road game presents an opportunity for the Cougars to rebound and improve their away game performance.
Bottom LineWashington State needs to address its rebounding issues while leveraging its three-point ability to improve its chances in upcoming matches. Continuous reliance on perimeter shooting without solid inside play may limit the Cougars' success as they navigate the rest of the WCC season.
Read more at Washington State University Athletics

author: Redacción PERÚ21
title: Pautas para cuidar su riñón y combatir la enfermedad silenciosa
text: Los malos hábitos alimenticios y enfermedades como la hipertensión arterial y la diabetes mellitus podrían afectar la salud de sus riñones. Los riñones filtran las toxinas de la sangre y el exceso de agua. Si estos fallan, podrían llevar al paciente al tratamiento de la hemodiálisis o esperar la donación de un riñón. Según el Ministerio de Salud (MINSA), el 11% de la población padece de insuficiencia renal crónica (ERC), que representa la pérdida gradual de la función renal. Asimismo, la enfermedad renal crónica se conoce como el ‘asesino silencioso’, ya que no presenta síntomas hasta que se encuentra en una fase avanzada. [MIRA: Anemia infantil aumenta a 43,1% a nivel nacional, según última ENDES 2023] Por ello, el Dr. Giraldo Arnaldi Paredes Chávez, nefrólogo de la Clínica Stella Maris, nos comparte claves y consejos que nos ayudará cuidar de nuestros riñones: - Consumir una cucharadita de sal al día: Según la OMS se recomienda ingerir menos de 2,000 mg al día, lo que equivale a una cucharadita de sal a día, ya que el exceso del consumo de sal provoca la retención de líquidos. - Evitar el consumo de alimentos procesados o chatarra: Debemos restringir el consumo de alimentos chatarra como las gaseosas, energizantes, grasas, refrescos etc.; y de alimentos ultra procesados como embutidos ya que contienen mucha sal. Tenga cuidado cuando compre sus productos y verifique si cuenta con el octógono ‘alto en sodio’. Asimismo, se debe evitar el consumo de carnes rojas y vísceras. - Realizar actividad física: Se recomienda como mínimo 30 minutos diarios. Además, que la obesidad y sobrepeso son factores de padecer insuficiencia renal crónica. - Hacer control de glucosa y presión arterial: Sobre todo si tiene un familiar con hipertensión arterial o diabetes, debe acudir al médico y hacerse exámenes de sangre y orina, al menos una vez al año. - Beber líquidos: Hidratarnos ayuda a diluir la orina y a eliminar las bacterias y toxinas. Por ello, no olvide tomar sus tres litros diarios de agua. “Si el paciente llega a ser diagnosticado de insuficiencia renal crónica, se procede a llevar el tratamiento de la hemodiálisis, que consiste filtrar las toxinas y el exceso de agua, reemplazando la función de los riñones a través de una máquina. Este proceso, de por vida, puede ser agotador y desgastante para el paciente”, concluye el especialista. Perú21 ePaper, [ingresa aquí ](https://epaper.peru21.pe/)y pruébalo gratis.

author: @indiatoday
title: Jeff Bezos's Blue Origin postpones maiden launch of New Glenn rocket
text:

SIGN IN Edition IN IN US Home TV Live TV Primetime Elections Delhi Maharashtra Jharkhand Magazine Latest Edition Insight Best Colleges Life+Style India South Global Business All Sports Sports Today Cricket Football Tennis Technology Entertainment Showbuzz Bollywood Hollywood OTT Latest Reviews Newspresso Specials Podcasts First Things Fast Sunday Special History of It NewsMo DIU Interactives Opinion Games Videos Short Videos Fact Check Other News Education It's Viral Science Health Auto Law Today Environment Cities Weather Web Stories Horoscopes Download App Follow Us On: News SCIENCE Jeff Bezos's Blue Origin postpones maiden launch of New Glenn rocket Jeff Bezos's Blue Origin postpones maiden launch of New Glenn rocket The New Glenn rocket, towering at 320 feet (98 meters), represents a significant step for Blue Origin as it aims to establish itself in the competitive space launch market.
Listen to Story
Live TV
Share Advertisement Blue Origin's New Glenn launch vehicle vertical on pad. (Photo: Blue Origin) India Today Science Desk
New Delhi, UPDATED: Jan 10, 2025 11:00 IST In Short The New Glenn rocket towers at 320 feet (98 meters) The rocket features a reusable first stage designed to return to Earth It will land on a barge named Jacklyn, after Jeff Bezos' mother. Blue Origin has officially postponed the inaugural launch of its New Glenn reusable launch vehicle to January 12, 2025, due to adverse weather conditions in the Atlantic Ocean.
The launch, originally scheduled for January 10, was delayed because of high sea states affecting the planned landing area for the rocket's booster.
In a statement posted on social media, Blue Origin explained, “We’re shifting our NG-1 launch date to no earlier than January 12 due to a high sea state in the Atlantic where we hope to land our booster.” The company emphasized that the three-hour launch window will remain unchanged, opening at the same time on the new date.
advertisement The New Glenn rocket, towering at 320 feet (98 meters), represents a significant step for Blue Origin as it aims to establish itself in the competitive space launch market. Pointy end up! New Glenn is vertical at LC-36 in Florida. Just need the sea to settle down a bit. Some context on our 1/12 target launch date—our objective is to reach orbit. Anything beyond that is a bonus. Landing our booster offshore is ambitious—but we’re going for it. No... pic.twitter.com/R76uArtxda — Dave Limp (@davill) January 10, 2025
The rocket features a reusable first stage designed to return to Earth and land on a barge named Jacklyn, after Jeff Bezos' mother. Successfully landing the booster is a critical aspect of Blue Origin's strategy to promote reusability and reduce costs in space travel.
<div class='ads__container inline-story-add id ='v-indiatoday-in' > This inaugural mission, designated NG-1, will carry the Blue Ring Pathfinder payload as part of a national security space launch certification flight.
Company officials have expressed optimism about the mission despite the challenges associated with first launches, which often come with lower success expectations due to untested components.
As anticipation builds for the revised launch date, Blue Origin plans to stream the countdown live on its website. The company remains committed to learning from each flight and refining its technology for future missions in what promises to be an exciting era for commercial space exploration. Published By: Sibu Kumar Tripathi Published On: Jan 10, 2025 Must Watch
